about_the_game:
The technical demo for the final keeper aims to demonstrate all the building mechanics in the game, as well as other features that will act
as the foundation upon which the final game will be built.

The final keeper is a block-based open world with a focus on itemization, bossing, and RPG mechanics.
The demo will mostly focus on the block-based systems that will make the world of the game!

The game is still in early development and is using a funding campaign on our own website to support the development.
